mapper.select: select ID, company_info, create_time, update_time, version, flag ,excel_import_key from zdb_financial.crawl_company_info where ID = #{id}
select ID, company_info, create_time, update_time, version, flag ,excel_import_key from zdb_financial.crawl_company_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into zdb_financial.crawl_company_info(company_info, create_time, update_time, version, flag , excel_import_key) values (#{companyInfo}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{version}, #{flag},#{excelImportKey})
mapper.update:
update zdb_financial.crawl_company_info
company_info = #{companyInfo},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
version = #{version},
flag = #{flag},
excel_import_key = #{excelImportKey},
where ID = #{id}
